item.title: Why Should You Consider Using Aluminium for Your CNC Machined Parts
item.description: Aluminium is the second most plentiful metallic element on earth.

item.title: 5 Ways to Finish an Aluminium CNC Machined Part
item.description: Aluminium alloys are often a great option when it comes to choosing the right material for you CNC machined parts and prototypes.

item.title: Understanding Wrought Aluminium Alloys Designations
item.description: The wrought alloy designation system consists of four numerical digits, sometimes preceded by a capital letter.

item.title: Which Aluminium Alloy Should I Choose for my CNC Machined Parts?
item.description: Aluminium alloys can be machined rapidly and economically.

item.title: How to Specify a Temper When Choosing an Aluminium Alloy
item.description: Since the properties of aluminium alloys are so influenced by work hardening and heat treatment, the temper (strengthening treatment, if any) must be designated in addition to the composition code.
